llm_res.rule: transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) - Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) - Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
name() public view returns (string) - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
